Name: Caf√© Droog
Review Text:
The pastries are house-made and to die for, you have to try their avocado cake!
Love the atmosphere of the cafe too, there’s beautiful art to look at while sipping your drink. The staff is friendly!

Name: Caf√© Droog
Review Text:
How much I miss having French toasts here 😭 Can’t wait to be back!

Absolutely love the ambience, open space aesthetics, food, coffee, and everything in between!

Name: Caf√© Droog
Review Text: The place has a very nice interior and location. Portions was small and it took us forever to wait for the food. It was just few people for breakfast there, but it took almost 1 hour to cook an eggs. If you have all the time of your life you can go there.

Name: Caf√© Droog
Review Text:
Great place. Combination of a gallery, store, workspace and restaurant.
Best thing is, they have a super cute hidden garden!
I love their effort to combine the different parts inside Droog together.  An exhibition inspired dish.

A place with a soul...

Name: Caf√© Droog
Review Text: Great lunch and coffee stop. Also a very cool workspace & hidden garden. No exhibition today but some lovely artwork in the main space . Grilled cabbage was to die for 😊

Name: Caf√© Droog
Review Text: Unique ambiance, quite the hidden gem in this historical building on one of the most beautiful canals in Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© Droog

Name: Caf√© Droog

Name: Caf√© Droog
Review Text: I've been here twice but both times were excellent. The food is great (and served in interesting dishes), the staff is friendly and attentive, and the shop/exhibit give you little reason to not walk around and burn some calories after stuffing your face with food.
